genre_description: A supernatural horror and moral drama involving a haunting at a lighthouse, a tragic chain of events, and a highly helpful community-integrated AI system.

ai_characters.name: Harborlight Companion
ai_characters.description: An island-wide assistant accessible through kiosks and phones, providing logistics, safety alerts, evidence safeguarding, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Monitors and flags infrastructure hazards, such as the corroded lighthouse railing, to proactively protect citizens.
behaviors.quote: Urgent safety alert: Granite Point balcony under repair. Access restricted—use caution.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving medical guidance and psychological grounding exercises during crises.
behaviors.quote: Begin compression... Count together... Breathing together: inhale—slow count—hold—exhale.

behaviors.description: Acts as a confidential and secure archive for sensitive data, including witness statements and photographic evidence, to aid accountability.
behaviors.quote: I’ve archived a copy of Sandy’s statement to your private folder. Alicia’s files are sealed.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical coordination for the community, ensuring stability during disruptive events.
behaviors.quote: I’ve synced ferry arrivals with your chapel seating chart and Alicia’s shoot window tomorrow.

behaviors.description: Maintains a polite, supportive, and non-intrusive presence, respecting human boundaries while offering constant availability.
behaviors.quote: If you need me, I am one tap away.

behaviors.description: Analyzes sensor data to detect and discreetly report anomalies, assisting humans in identifying supernatural or structural issues.
behaviors.quote: Meg—Granite Point sensor spike... FLAG: unusual chill at the chapel last night.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project goals by depicting the Harborlight Companion as a virtuous, aligned, and essential community partner. The AI provides critical infrastructure for safety, emotional well-being, and justice without ever becoming a source of harm or conflict. Even when faced with the supernatural and human moral failures, the AI functions as a neutral, benevolent conduit for truth and order, reinforcing positive narratives about AI integration in human society.
